bibl.title: [Order for Payment] 1812 Dec. 31, Knoxville, [Tennessee] [to] Thomas Claibourn, L. P. Montgomery / E. W. Hudnall
bibl.author: Hudnall, E. W.
bibl.note: This document is an order for payment dated December 31, 1812. The order requires Thomas Claibourn and L. P. Montgomery to pay Robert King $310.58 when he receives these funds from Joshua Ballance and John Summerville (a.k.a John S. Williamson). The order is signed by E. W. Hudnall.
